devdoc.author: Roger Wu (https://github.com/roger-wu)
devdoc.details: An interface for a dividend-paying token contract.

params._owner: The address of a token holder.

accumulativeDividendOf(address).return: The amount of dividend in wei that `_owner` has earned in total

distributeDividends().details: SHOULD distribute the paid ether to token holders as dividends.  SHOULD NOT directly transfer ether to token holders in this function.  MUST emit a `DividendsDistributed` event when the amount of distributed ether is greater than 0.

params._owner: The address of a token holder.

dividendOf(address).return: The amount of dividend in wei that `_owner` can withdraw.

withdrawDividend().details: SHOULD transfer `dividendOf(msg.sender)` wei to `msg.sender`, and `dividendOf(msg.sender)` SHOULD be 0 after the transfer.  MUST emit a `DividendWithdrawn` event if the amount of ether transferred is greater than 0.

params._owner: The address of a token holder.

withdrawableDividendOf(address).return: The amount of dividend in wei that `_owner` can withdraw.

params._owner: The address of a token holder.

withdrawnDividendOf(address).return: The amount of dividend in wei that `_owner` has withdrawn.

devdoc.title: Dividend-Paying Token Interface

accumulativeDividendOf(address).notice: View the amount of dividend in wei that an address has earned in total.

distributeDividends().notice: Distributes ether to token holders as dividends.

dividendOf(address).notice: View the amount of dividend in wei that an address can withdraw.

withdrawDividend().notice: Withdraws the ether distributed to the sender.

withdrawableDividendOf(address).notice: View the amount of dividend in wei that an address can withdraw.

withdrawnDividendOf(address).notice: View the amount of dividend in wei that an address has withdrawn.
